name: Bedroom Cuboro Stacks by Sean Lockwood, 2016

metadata.name: Bedroom Cuboro Stacks â€“ 5/100
metadata.description:
A series of 3D rendered animations describing Cuboro block arrangements contained in a corner of a bedroom, with different simulated time-of-day lighting. As a screensaver, each animation corresponds to the time and location of the housing computer.

by sean lockwood, 2016    
production by laurel schwulst and daniel brewster

Initially tokens for this work were minted on the bitcoin blockchain, using the now defunct service [ascribe.io](https://www.ascribe.io/). The ERC721 contract for this artwork was deployed in 2018.
